name: Transfer between impairment stages derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Transfer between impairment stages from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET TRNSFR_IMPRMNT_STGS =
        CASE
            WHEN INTL_IMPRMNT_STTS = 23
                THEN
                    CASE
                        WHEN IMPRMNT_STTS = 24 THEN 3
                        WHEN IMPRMNT_STTS = 25 THEN 5
                    END

            WHEN INTL_IMPRMNT_STTS = 24
                THEN
                    CASE
                        WHEN IMPRMNT_STTS = 23 THEN 1
                        WHEN IMPRMNT_STTS = 25 THEN 6
                    END

            WHEN INTL_IMPRMNT_STTS = 25
                THEN
                    CASE
                        WHEN IMPRMNT_STTS = 23 THEN 2
                        WHEN IMPRMNT_STTS = 24 THEN 4
                    END
        END;
